titleStmt.title: A fannaticks mite cast into the Kings treasury being a sermon printed to the King because not preach'd before the King / by Henry Adis.
titleStmt.author: Adis, Henry.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and amended.

notesStmt.note: "A declaration of a small society of baptized believers undergoing the name of free-willers about the city of London": p. 49-59.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
